periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
